Demos for the prosthetic-hand.js library

Compatibility disclaimer

Demos showing off TouchEvents will only work in a browser that implements TouchEvents. Which means: use Chrome for those.

The same goes for PointerEvents and browsers which implement PointerEvents. Which means: IE11/Edge.

Demos

  • map-pan: move a map around
  • map-zoom: zoom a map in and out
  • map-timing: move a map with different timings
